::Shadow Wing::

She heard his request on her link.  She wouldn't try to contact him 
unless it was an emergency.  Untill then, he would have to fend for 
himself.  She went to the base entrance and looked out into the 
forest.  "Just take care of yourself.  If you come back injured, 
you'll be dealing with me." she said with a smirk.  She knew he 
couldn't hear her, but she hoped he would return safely to her.
